title: Borealis: A Worldmaker of Yand Novel
description: Fleeing the aftermath of interstellar warfare, Queen Asimia brings her husbands, her beloved uncle and grandmother, on a trek across galaxies to a new promised land. Many colonists follow her with stars in their eyes. Among them is a young, brave warrior woman, RC. When danger finds them along the way, RC sacrifices herself for her Queen, creating a time paradox that shakes two worlds—and robs a boy of his one and only love. What he must do to bring her back…
author: Andri E. Elia
